questionTitle: Your behaviour makes me ________.
The price of the meal ________ a service charge.
This ________ invention of yours should make you rich.
There were so ________ people in the queue for tickets that I missed the train.
Many people think that Robert Redford is a ________-looking actor.
Would you risk ________ $500 on a horse?
David always ________ over to my house after he had done his homework.
If ________ it would stop raining for a morning, we could cut the grass.
A copy of our spring brochure is ________ with this letter.
You thought I did wrong but the results ________ my action.
Never ________, we'll see the film next week.
Some schools have very ________ rules of behaviour which must be obeyed.
At the hospital I was told that ________ I gave up smoking immediately my illness would get much worse.
His car was ________ in the accident.
It took Western economies many years to ________ from the oil crisis of the mid-70s.
It doesn't sound ________ he knows anything about it.
Without money you will be ________ to do anything about setting up your own business.
He delights ________ annoying me.
They would find another hotel if their rooms ________ for them.
Well I'm not surprised they are in a mess. It's not exactly ________ -shattering news.
